home.title: Polimaks control center
home.subtitle: Keep warehouse stock and shop floor tasks in one clean dashboard.

inventoryCard.title: Warehouse flows
inventoryCard.body: Materials, waste, and finished goods in one place.

home.rateDialogHint: Specify USD/EUR/RUB/UZS conversion rates for the selected dates. Empty fields fall back to the last fetched rate.

machinesCard.body: Track printing, cutting, and lamination tasks.

home.cta: Pick a section from the sidebar to get started.

clientsPage.title: Clients

clientsPage.deleteHint: You can add it back later.
clientsPage.complaintHint: Quickly jot down a complaint from this client.
clientsPage.planHint: Set limit for the current or future months. Past months are disabled.
clientsPage.planTodoBody: Order totals will be pulled from production/ERP later. For now, only the monthly limit is captured here.

clientsMaterialsPage.title: Tolling materials
clientsMaterialsPage.subtitle: Pick the client, note the zakaz, and leave one short note about materials or pickup.
clientsMaterialsPage.listSubtitle: Create client accounts, then open their materials history.
clientsMaterialsPage.historySubtitle: Materials we received from this client.
clientsMaterialsPage.deleteHint: Records live in your browser only; removing one won't touch other systems.
clientsMaterialsPage.emptyForClient: No material records for this client yet.
clientsMaterialsPage.listEmpty: No clients yet. Add an account to start tracking materials.
clientsMaterialsPage.notesHint: Anything important about materials, pickup timing, or reminders.
clientsMaterialsPage.providedHint: E.g. PET rolls 500 kg, lacquer 20 kg
clientsMaterialsPage.receivedHint: Finished goods or items the client picked up
clientsMaterialsPage.noClients: No clients found. Add an account first.
clientsMaterialsPage.localHint: Saved to this browser (localStorage) until you hook up an API.

clientsTransactionsPage.detailSubtitle: Balance, promises, and payments for this client.
clientsTransactionsPage.detailNoTransactions: This client has no recorded transactions yet.
